section.title: Production Time Clock by User
section.para: To view Time Clock information by user, select the "Production Time Clock by User" option. The following screen will appear:

When users post Operations from the Shop Floor Workbench, they have the option to post either standard or specified times—and the run time recorded will vary depending on the option chosen. The standard times are drawn from the Bill of Operations Item definitions. By contrast, the specified times are based on the users' clock in/out times (i.e., "effort"). The specified effort for an Operation may be complicated by the fact that users can be clocked into more than one Work Order at a time. In this case, the users' effort will be spread across the various Work Orders they have clocked into.
When displaying Time Clock information by User, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the username of the user whose Time Clock information you want to view.
Work Orders scheduled on and after this date will be displayed.

Display lists Work Orders the user has clocked-in to, using the specified parameters.
